citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 PM on
10-Jul-17.
Called licensee's cell phone. She did return my call in a few minutes and was not available for an inspection. Her
hours of availability were discussed.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 PM on
10-Jul-17.
Called licensee's cell phone.  She did return my call in a few minutes and was not available for an inspection.  Her
hours of availability were discussed.
